nut.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a dry brown fruit inside a hard shell, that grows on a tree
nut.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: We were sitting round the fire cracking nuts (=opening them).
nut.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: a small piece of metal with a hole through the middle which is screwed onto a bolt to fasten things together
nut.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: Use a wrench to loosen the nut.
nut.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: someone who is crazy or behaves strangely
nut.translation[0].definitions[2].exampl: My dad is such a nut.
What are you, some kind of nut?
nut.translation[0].definitions[3].exampl: Oh come on, use your nut!
nut.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to hit someone with your head
nut.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: He just turned round and nutted me!
nut.translation[2].definitions[0].defini: (the National Union of Teachers) one of the main professional trade unions which represents teachers in England and Wales, in both government and private schools
